name: nightingale-wp
description: Wordpress theme for NHS Leadership Academy using nightingale-core

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./assets && cat assets/main.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style expanded > assets/main.css
scripts.watch: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ assets/main.scss --watch

author: NHS Leadership Academy
